name: Janken Dungeon
description:
As I have run out of time for the game jam and have to send it in early this is just a description to say that there will be more coming this weekend. 

It is still a working demo, but it isn't were I would like it to be. 

There are still some balancing issues and no skill upgrades yet, so I will be doing that this weekend.

Sorry for anyone with their hopes up, it will be done soon.
